=== Using Extension Filter ===
* - wildcard for any number of characters
? - wildcard for one character.

Example : 
  # if we want to include only all .cs files, we can just include a filter "*.cs" and set it to include.
  # if we want to exclude all .java file, we can just include a filter "*.java" and set it to exclude.
